names.pl: Podwójny cios (OS and TOPH)Dwuklask (DP and BW series)

Ruby.en: Repeatedly slaps the foe 2 to 5 times.

Sapphire.en: Repeatedly slaps the foe 2 to 5 times.

Emerald.en: Repeatedly slaps the foe 2 to 5 times.

FireRed.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times.

LeafGreen.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times.

Diamond.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Pearl.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Platinum.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

HeartGold.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

SoulSilver.en: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Black.en: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
Black.de: Trifft das Ziel 2- bis 5-mal hintereinander mit einem Duplexhieb.

White.en: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
White.de: Trifft das Ziel 2- bis 5-mal hintereinander mit einem Duplexhieb.

X.en: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
X.de: Trifft das Ziel zwei- bis fünfmal hintereinander mit einem Duplexhieb.

Y.en: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
Y.de: Trifft das Ziel zwei- bis fünfmal hintereinander mit einem Duplexhieb.
